general_advisory: Dry weather with partly cloudy skies expected. Maintain soil moisture for rice seedlings, mulch vegetables, proper surveillance for pests and diseases, spray pesticides after 3 pm to protect honey bees.

advisory: Apply 800g Cartap Hydrochloride 4% or 400g Chlorantraniliprole 0.4% for nursery area before transplanting.
Plant resistant varieties to prevent red rot disease, soak setts in specified solution before planting.
Use Neem Based Pesticide or Profenophos/Chlorpyriphos for leaf miner control.
Use yellow sticky traps and neem-based pesticide for Whitefly control.
Spray Metalaxyl + Mancozeb or Fosetyl-AL to control Downey mildew.
Apply specified quantities of compost and fertilizers before transplanting seedlings.
Spray Ethion or Spiromesifen for mite control.
Spray specified fungicides to control leaf blight, stem rot, and root knot nematode.
Insulate poultry house in winter, provide mineral and calcium to laying birds.
